greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = index of the column where n is located in array A277880.
comment: a(n) = 1 + the number of iterations of map k -> A003188(A006068(k)/2) that are required (when starting from k = n) until k is an odious number.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: a(0) = 0, for n >= 1, if A010060(n) = 1 [when n is one of the odious numbers, A000069], then a(n) = 1, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A003188(A006068(n)/2)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 03 2016
